title: Manta-class Assault Starfighter
wikitext:
[[File:Manta-class-Assault-Starfighter.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''Craft''': Tapani Starship Cooperative Manta-class Starfighter
'''Type''': Intermediate Assault Starfighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 12 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter Piloting: Manta-class Starfighter
'''Crew''': 1, 1 gunner
'''Crew Skill''':  Starship Gunnery 4D, Starfighter Piloting 4D+2, Starship Shields 4D, Sensors 4D.
'''Cargo Capacity''': 100kg
'''Consumables''': 1 Week
'''Cost''': 95,000 Credits
'''Maneuverability''': 3D+2 (attack formation), 1D (intercept formation)
'''Space''': 7 (attack formation), 10 (intercept formation)
'''Hull''': 2D+1
'''Shields''': 2D+1

Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 1-250/1/1.5km
